txt.en: The sight of the enemy drives your war-steed into a violent rage, causing certain attacks to perform additional bleed damage.

#1:[placeholder]: The following skills will apply an additional moderate bleed to the target: #1:{None|Keen Strike and Strategic Strike.[G]|Measured Attack and Oppressive Blow.[C]|Sundering Blow and Destabilizing Strike.[H]|Driving Slash and Rohan's Edge.[U]|Flay Open and Spread of Arrows.[T]|Metal and Mettle and Enduring Embers.[L]|Hammer of the Rohan and Cry of the Eorlingas.[I]|Invoke the Elements and Oration of Embers.[K]|Strike with Power and Clash of Steel and Will.[W]| Slash, Bee Swarm[B]| Strike[R]|Quick Strike, Wounding Knife[O]}
